title: Episode 142: Ante Up (Feat. Matt Barnes)
itunes:title: Episode 142: Ante Up (Feat. Matt Barnes)
description:
On this weeks episode, former NBA player, Matt Barnes sits with ladies of Lip Service. He opens up about his current status regarding his ex-wife, Gloria Govan. Gloria spoke to TMZ claiming Matt wasn't allowed at her upcoming wedding with Derek Fisher...and he had quite the response. Matt breaks down why he hates 'Basketball Wives' so much as well as the how Shaquille O'neal is the reason he was on the show in the first place.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
